title: 3 Bed Terraced House, Mcgredy, EN7
short_description: Delightful 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom terraced house in a great location
description:
We are proud to offer this delightful 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom terraced house in a great location. Available to move in from 19 March 2024. Property is offered unfurnished. Viewing highly recommended.

Property Reference: 9McGredy

title: 2 Bed Flat, Westwood Road, IG3
short_description: Contemporary ground floor 2 bedroom & 2 bathroom flat with complimentary parking
description:
We are offering to let this Contemporary ground floor 2 bedroom & 2 Bathroom Flat with complimentary parking within a purposed built building that has been completely redecorated, finishing stunningly.

This Flat is very spacious, providing good ventilation throughout the flat and offering an extra-large open plan living space: two double bedrooms & 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite bathroom & a family bathroom).

In addition, it offers a good size private patio/garden area towards the rear end of the flat and a gated courtyard parking facility. Each room has a rear door opening that leads directly to the private patio/garden area giving a great source for fresh air & light during the summer.

It is located within a 10-minute walk (close proximity) to both Goodmayes & Seven kings station (Cross Rail).

Property Reference: Flat 2HH

title: 1 Bed Flat, St Leonards Street, E3
short_description: Contemporary, ground-floor, one-bedroom flat for rent. Recently refurbished and redecorated
description:
One-Bedroom Flat for Rent on St Leonards Street, London, E3. Location: Less than a one-minute walk to Bromley by Bow Tube Station.

We are delighted to offer this contemporary, ground-floor, one-bedroom flat for rent. Recently refurbished and redecorated, this bright and airy flat features sleek, modern finishes.

Be Part of History: This flat is located in a beautifully converted historic pub building, now a block of modern flats.

Features:

  • Spacious open-plan lounge with ceiling fan
  • Double bedroom
  • Fantastic bathroom
  • Fully furnished with white goods, including a tall fridge freezer, slimline dishwasher, washing machine, and fitted electric hob and oven
  • Living room with a 3-seater sofabed that converts into a double bed for guests
  • Wardrobe

Transport Links: Bromley by Bow Tube Station (District & Circle lines) â€“ less than a one-minute walk

title: 2 Bed Flat, Chadwell Heath, RM8
short_description: Stunning decorated first-floor apartment with walk-in en-suite and private corner wardrobe master bedroom
description:
Stunning Opportunity in RM8. A stunning decorated first-floor apartment with a walk-in En-suite private corner Wardrobe Master bedroom. It has a luxurious and airy open living space, a family bath, and a separate fitted kitchen.

This Flat is just 5 minutes away from Chadwell Heath station and is awaiting the right kind of Tenant to appreciate its uniqueness.

The property is centrally located and benefits from:

  • 2 Double Bedroom
  • Good size family Bathrooms
  • Spacious open plan living
  • Separate fitted kitchen
  • Double Glazed
  • Laminate Flooring
  • Allocated parking
  • Entry phone system
  • 32 Minutes to Canary Wharf & 25 Minutes to Liverpool Street

Property Reference: 25AMC
